actions.text: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Bob Schaffer.
On agreeing to the Bob Schaffer amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 238 (Roll no. 386).

description: Amendment sought to increase funding for education programs for neglected and delinquent youth by $40 million and reduce Goals 2000 funding accordingly.
purpose: An amendment to increase funds appropriated in the bill for Delinquent and hight risk youth programs by $40 million, and to cut funds for Goals 2000 programss comensurately.
